name: Mugaia
description:
Kind of weird canyon but not uninteresting. Sometimes wide open and polished rock, then narrow with boulders but still pools to jump, changes aspect practically every 50m of height difference.

Approach

Everything on the hiking path on the way up to Monte Zucchero.

Descent

A lot of slabs, but also a few high verticals, and especially in the lower part many technical jumps (need to jump far away).

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
